content: Isobel from Rhiwbina, Cardiff, was last spotted on Saturday night, April 29 She hasn't been seen or spoken to for three days and was reported missing A desperate appeal has been launched to locate a missing teenager who was last spotted Saturday night, on April 29.

Isobel, 15, from Rhiwbina, Cardiff, was reported missing and hasn't been spotted or spoken to for three days.She is described as 5ft 6in tall, of slim build, with long brown hair.As well as Cardiff, she is believed to have links to Leyton in London.South Wales police are asking anyone with information on her whereabouts to contact them, quoting reference, 2300138168.
